name: Rajesh Kumar
presenting_complaint: Painful mouth ulcer with swelling in left jaw region.
clinical_exam: Ulcerative lesion on left mandibular alveolus with lymphadenopathy.
history: Chronic tobacco chewing for 30 years, occasional alcohol use.
family_history: No known history of cancer in immediate family.
treatment_plan: Radical surgery followed by adjuvant radiation and chemotherapy.
outcome: Partial response with reduction in tumor size at 6 months.
